item.title: The Forbidden Chapter Isaiah 53
item.description: Today I came across Tree of Life Ministries, and specifically this really great demonstration of using Isaiah 53 in preaching to Jews. Seemingly most are not even aware of what the chapter says, let alone who it is actually talking about! Check out their ministry over at their youtube channel.
